Articles.Content:
Rube Goldberg Challange!

    The objective is to make a Rube Goldberg machine, to do a simple task (this can be anything). For those of you who don't know what a Rube Goldberg machine is, it is a machine that has multiple stages to do a simple task.

Rules:

-Must have over Three sections

-Sections must go in order

-No mods, except Vessel Mover (this mod is actually recommended)

-No cheats or hacks, with the exception of whack-a-kerbal

-Must be completely autonomous (no control), and you can only start with staging

(Rules subject to change)

Competition lasts from June 1st to August 31st

Contraptions will be judged in catagories:

-Most creative design

-Largest Contraption

-Most aesthetically pleasing (Best looking)

This means you have a chance to win one, or all of these catagories

If you have something to suggest (like a mod or a rule), please tell me and I may implement it.

Leaderboard:

-Most Creative: 

-Largest Contraption:

-Best Looking:

Have fun and good luck!
Hot dam this will be challenging
